'Unanimous Verdict, Your Honor': Sam Bankman-Fried's Conviction Was Inevitable https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/11/03/unanimous-verdict-your-honor-sam-bankman-frieds-conviction-was-inevitable/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines VAVOI7DI5VB5LFAOPP5AH62UGQ Nikhilesh DeTwelve jurors spent less than five hours deciding the facts. They asked for portions of transcripts from Paradigm's Matt Huang and Third Point's Robert Boroujerdi testimony, as well as highlighters and Post-it Notes, and when they didn't immediately receive the version of the indictment, they requested that too. And yet, they quickly decided that Bankman-Fried was guilty on all seven counts.
